attributes.action: include a 'non of the above' choice on ballot papers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people would like to vote but the choice of candidates is often poor or their values are not in tune with public interest. Including a 'non of the above' choice on ballot papers will allow voters to show politicians that they are willing to vote but current policies are out of touch.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
